title: Amazon Hardware Event liveblog
description: Amazon's annual hardware event is happening at Noon Eastern on September 28, and we're going to liveblog the heck out of it.

title: Nvidia addresses the rumors about the RTX 40 GPUs’ power consumption
description: There have been many concerns about the power consumption of RTX 40-Series GPUs. Nvidia spoke up on the matter.

title: Watch this NOAA plane take on Hurricane Ian
description: The NOAA has released dramatic footage of one of its aircraft flying through Hurricane Ian as part of a science mission.
